name: Ticket Crusher
description:
This is a game I made over the course of about 3 weeks reflecting on the technical support job I hate. Close those tickets and don't miss those phone calls!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys/Left Stick/D-Pad: Movement

Z Key/A Button: Clicking

The .TIC file can be played with a controller via the TIC-80 Fantasy Console, but unfortunately only keyboard controls are available in the web version. The Windows executable can be run directly and is bundled with TIC-80.
